about_the_game:
You are a slave! is a first-person adventure. In this game you are taken into slavery. For fear of death, you decide to escape from the castle with the help of your new friend. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to escape from the castle.

In a first-person adventure game, you have to become a slave of sexy girls! But your new frog friend will save you from slavery. Get out of slavery without being seen by any naked sexy girl. You have to solve puzzles to get out of slavery alive and finally become free.

ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY
In the game You are a slave! very beautiful graphics and catchy gameplay!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for adults only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

name: You are a slave!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
